WEATHER FORECAST FOR 03 APRIL 2024
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 03 April 2024

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central,
North-western  and  Southern  provinces  after  2.00  p.m.  Showers  or  thundershowers  may
occur at a few places in North-central and Uva provinces during the afternoon or night.

airly heavy showers about 75 mm are likely at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa and
Central provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.

isty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Central, Sabaragamuwa and
Uva provinces and in Galle and Matara districts during the morning.

eneral  public  is  kindly  requested  to  take  adequate  precautions  to  minimize  damages
